nodes.bodyText: While ur at it could you please separate this to a couple lines?

I would probably not modify this method like that.
There is a dedicated class for the Cheat Sheet, so I reckon it may probably be wiser to override the method there (make it protected too of course) and then just display any non-flex category regardless of the visibility.
I think this design choice would make much more sense since someone might expect this to be in the cheat sheet class, as it is a special functionality of that particular object and not the normal guide.

A javadocs tag and some nullability annotations would be nice.
Other than that it's looking good as it is.
The annotations should be added here as well
Ehm, you didn't actually add the annotations but added the javadocs instead?
